Against players, each time the Opponent scores a Critical Hit, reduce their base weapon Damage by X for 2 rounds.
Against players, reduce the Opponent's base Critical Hit Damage by X.
Against players, increase base weapon Damage by X.
When fighting Hostiles or Armadas, at the start of each round gain an X chance to apply Hull Breach for 2 rounds.
Increases the amount of resources you get from destroying non-armada Xindi hostiles with any ship by X.
Gain X Apex Barrier when fighting Xindi Reptiles or Xindi Aquatics.
When fighting non-Armada Hostiles, at the start of each round increase Apex Barrier by X for 5 rounds.
Increase the amount of resources your ship receives from non-Armada Hostiles by X.
When fighting non-Armada Hostiles, at the start of each round increases Isolytic Cascade Damage by X for 3 rounds.
Increases the amount of resources you get from destroying hostiles with the Texas-class [DAL] tag by X.
Gain X Apex Barrier when fighting hostiles with the Texas-class [DAL] tag.
Increases Isolytic Cascade damage by X for 1 round (This ability can stack)
Reduces Isolytic Damage received from Hostiles and Armadas by X.
Against players, on round start if your ship has any state active reduce the Opponent's Isolytic Cascade damage by X for 2 rounds.
Against players, increase your Isolytic defense by X.
Against players while your ship has any state active, increase base weapon damage by X.
When fighting Hostiles or Armadas, at the start of each round gain an X chance to apply Burning for 2 rounds.
Increases Isolytic Damage for the Gorn Eviscerator against Gorn Hunters by X.
Increases the amount of Apex Isomatter gained when defeating Gorn Hunters by X.
Against players, increase Apex Barrier by X at combat start.
Against players who have Morale active, reduce their weapon shots by X.
Against players, increase Shield Health by X.
Increase the Warp Distance of the ship by X.
Increase Warp Speed of the ship by X.
Against Players, on round start if your ship is below 40% Hull Health increase your Shots by X for 1 round
Against Players, on round start if your ship is below 40% Hull Health repair your Shield by X for 1 round
Against Players, on round start if your ship is below 40% Hull Health decrease the opponents Isolytic Defense by X
Increases your Apex Barrier at start of battle when fighting Hostiles or Invading Entities by X for 3 rounds (if Tal not present on bridge)
Increases your Critical Damage at start of battle when fighting Armadas or Invading Entities by X for 3 rounds
Increases your Shield Repair at start of battle when fighting Hostiles, Armadas or Invading Entities by X for 3 rounds

Increases Critical Damage against Mirror Universe hostiles by X.
Increases Weapon Damage by X when enemy HHP is below 40%.
At the start of each round, increases Isolytic Defense by X for 4 rounds against players.
Increases Apex Shred against players by X. Does not trigger during station combat.
On combat start against players, reduces the opponent's Critical Hit Chance by X for 5 rounds. Does not trigger during station combat.
Increases Isolytic Damage against players when using the GS-31 by X.
Reduces Critical Damage of players Weakened by the Gravitational Blast by X. Does not trigger during station combat.
